Description: Rim sherd of East Greek grey ware pottery plate; gritty brownish grey fabric with large quantity of mica; slipped on interior and exterior; inscription on rim.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis) (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.1.9)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.103)
